name: PNO Innovatieadvies B.V.
goal: PNO is an independent grants and innovation consultancy, providing full services throughout Europe. PNO combines an understanding of the dynamics of clients activities and ambitions in the area of innovation and investments with insights into key societal issues that are supported by government funding. The net effect of PNO’s contribution is to reduce clients’ workload, increase return on investment and shorten time to market.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: At present, we are following the inititiative of the EV to establish a Circular Economy Finance Support Platform.
